name: Hatpocalypse
description:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kCX8mVIPn5U

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/590275996

Sell hats in your hat company for world hat domination! Keep an eye on the trends in the bottom right and make sure you're selling the best hat at the time! Obtain the Greater Wizard Hat to win! (and presumably destroy the planet in a hat-related incident off screen). Or see how rich you can become by mastering the stock market!

Credits:

2061313 - Design, major sprite creation, minor programming, trailer
